makerlabs package¶

Submodules¶

makerlabs.diybio_org module¶

class makerlabs.diybio_org.DiyBioLab[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a DIYBio Lab as it is described on diybio.org.

makerlabs.diybio_org.data_from_diybio_org()[source]¶

Scrapes data from diybio.org.

makerlabs.diybio_org.get_labs(format)[source]¶

Gets DIYBio Lab data from diybio.org.

makerlabs.diybio_org.labs_count()[source]¶

Gets the number of current DIYBio Labs listed on diybio.org.

makerlabs.fablabs_io module¶

class makerlabs.fablabs_io.FabLab[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a Fab Lab as it is described on fablabs.io.

class makerlabs.fablabs_io.Project[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a project as it is described on fablabs.io.

makerlabs.fablabs_io.data_from_fablabs_io(endpoint)[source]¶

Gets data from fablabs.io.

makerlabs.fablabs_io.get_labs(format)[source]¶

Gets Fab Lab data from fablabs.io.

makerlabs.fablabs_io.get_projects(format)[source]¶

Gets projects data from fablabs.io.

makerlabs.fablabs_io.labs_count()[source]¶

Gets the number of current Fab Labs registered on fablabs.io.

makerlabs.fablabs_io.projects_count()[source]¶

Gets the number of current projects submitted on fablabs.io.

makerlabs.hackerspaces_org module¶

Bases: object

Represents a Lab as it is described on hackerspaces.org.

Gets data from all labs from hackerspaces.org.

makerlabs.hackerspaces_org.labs_count()[source]¶

makerlabs.nesta module¶

class makerlabs.nesta.UKMakerspace[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a UK Makerspace from the NESTA research, in a simplified way.

makerlabs.nesta.data_from_nesta()[source]¶

Read data from the GitHub repo.

makerlabs.nesta.get_labs(format)[source]¶

Gets current UK Makerspaces data as listed by NESTA.

makerlabs.nesta.labs_count()[source]¶

Gets the number of current UK Makerspaces listed by NESTA.
